about_the_game:
"Shoot to Shoot is a unique physics-based shooting game where players must shoot balls using a firearm. The objective is to use bullets to collide with the balls, pushing them into the basket.

Core Gameplay: Shoot balls, using physics collisions to guide them into the basket.
Challenge and Fun: Each level is intricately designed, requiring precise aiming and strategic control of shooting angles and force.
Physics Engine: Experience realistic physics collisions, making every shot creative and challenging.
Sense of Achievement: Feel the satisfaction of seeing the balls fly into the basket, providing endless fun.
Visual Effects: Simple visual effects keep your focus on the shooting and challenges.
Replayability: Improve your skills and complete levels in shorter times!

Experience this skill-testing and creative shooting game, and challenge your accuracy and strategic abilities!"
detailed_description:
"Shoot to Shoot is a unique physics-based shooting game where players must shoot balls using a firearm. The objective is to use bullets to collide with the balls, pushing them into the basket.

Core Gameplay: Shoot balls, using physics collisions to guide them into the basket.
Challenge and Fun: Each level is intricately designed, requiring precise aiming and strategic control of shooting angles and force.
Physics Engine: Experience realistic physics collisions, making every shot creative and challenging.
Sense of Achievement: Feel the satisfaction of seeing the balls fly into the basket, providing endless fun.
Visual Effects: Simple visual effects keep your focus on the shooting and challenges.
Replayability: Improve your skills and complete levels in shorter times!

Experience this skill-testing and creative shooting game, and challenge your accuracy and strategic abilities!"
name: Shoot to Shoot demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Shoot balls with a gun, using physics collisions to push them into the basket. Test your precision and strategy to the limit.
